wrestler:GrappleRelic.NAME: GrappleRelic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, Grapple a random enemy.

wrestler:ForgetAtStartRelic.NAME: ForgetAtStartRelic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, discard 1 card from your draw pile.

wrestler:ComboCountOneRelic.NAME: ComboCountOneRelic
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Combo Multiplier increases every 4 cards instead of 5.
